meanings.definition: A small opening or hole through which to look, especially in a door.
meanings.sent1: I peeked through the peepholes in the door to see who was outside.
meanings.sent2: The detective used the peepholes to spy on the suspect without being noticed.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat tried to peek through the peepholes in the fence to catch a glimpse of the birds.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like tiny peepholes, always watching and observing everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The old house had mysterious peepholes that seemed to reveal secrets of the past.
